# Description

Daudi van Veen is an Assistant Professor in Youth & Family Studies at Erasmus University Rotterdam. He studies how people think, feel, and learn about culture-, ethnicity- and race-related topics throughout the lifespan. He is also a co-host of the podcast Joy in Academia.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Daudi van Veen"
special_skill <- "public outreach"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open source software", "data sharing", "data management", all_of(special_skill), "open access", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
